name: Volta Node.js Toolchain
description: Installs Volta and specified Node.js, npm, and Yarn versions for a consistent JavaScript development environment.

voltaHome.description: The directory where Volta will be installed. Defaults to '/home/vscode/.volta'.

nodeVersion.description: The Node.js version to install via Volta (e.g., 'lts', '18', '20'). Set to 'none' to skip Node.js installation.

npmVersion.description: The npm version to install via Volta (e.g., 'latest'). Set to 'none' to skip npm installation.

yarnVersion.description: The Yarn version to install via Volta (e.g., 'latest'). Set to 'none' to skip Yarn installation.

targetUser.description: The user for whom Volta will be installed. Defaults to 'vscode'.
